name: UITableViewCell.EditingStyle
desc: The editing control used by a cell.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The cell has no editing control. This is the default value.

items.name: case delete
items.desc: The cell has the delete editing control; this control is a red circle enclosing a minus sign.

items.name: case insert
items.desc: The cell has the insert editing control; this control is a green circle enclosing a plus sign.
